text: @GOPLeader Absolutely no scientific evidence to support & of the tyrannical actions recommend by that moron Fauci,CDC,NIH,WHO, etc. regarding Coronavirus. No science re: social distancing, using mask for gen. pop., closing businesses, phased reopening, etc.  Capricious maladroit schemes!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
